TextView.android:text: URANUS- The Seventh Planet from the Sun

Basic Information:
Type: Ice Giant
Order from Sun: 7th planet
Distance from Sun: ~2.88 billion km (~19.22 AU)
Diameter: 50,724 km
Mass: ~8.681 × 10²⁵ kg (about 14.5 times Earth's mass)
Gravity: 8.69 m/s² (about 89% of Earth's gravity)

Orbital And Rotational Characteristics:
Revolution period (around Sun): 84 Earth years
Rotation period (on its own axis): 17.24 Earth hours
Orbital Speed: 6.8 km/s
Axial Tilt: ~97.77° (rotates on its side)
Orbital Eccentricity: 0.046

Moons And Rings:
Number of Moons: 27 (major moons: Titania, Oberon, Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel)
Number of Rings: 13

Surface And Atmosphere:
Surface Temperature: ~ -224°C (-371°F) (Coldest planet in the Solar System)
Atmosphere Type: Thick, mainly hydrogen and helium
Main Gases in Atmosphere: Hydrogen (H₂), Helium (He), Methane (CH₄)
Weather Conditions: Fast winds, extreme seasons due to tilt, methane causes blue-green color
